page.title: 01Area 2 miles sth Bridgwater
page.content: This area is predominantly rural and agricultural, despite the fact that there is a very small town of 8000 people within this block. Little change has occurred in the village of Huntworth in architectural terms since the late 1800s. North Petherton is the main town in the block and still has some very old buildings especially the parish church which has not changed site in the last 1000 years. There are also some very modern new houses being built. North Petherton has its own district council and its own mayor. The most important event that happens in North Petherton is the carnival which is an annual event that takes place on the Saturday following the carnival in Bridgwater on the Thursday nearest to November 5. The carnival has taken place for nearly 100 years.
